oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Committee of the National League for Woman’s Service staff a booth at the Woman’s War Work exposition, Tennessee State Fair, 1918 September
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: A photograph of committee members from the National League for Woman’s Service at their booth during the Woman’s War Work exposition of the 1918 Tennessee State Fair. Among the committee are several representatives from the Service League and Girls' Patriotic League. Members sold box lunches at the booth to raise funds to purchase a Gold Star Flag. The Gold Star Flag honors military members who died during their service. Forms part of the Nashville Room Historic Photographs Collection. 1 photograph : b & w ; 8 x 10 in.
